column1: U.S. CITIZEN AIR TRAFFIC2 TO OVERSEAS REGIONS, CANADA & MEXICO
1 Final data does include 'late records' in Total Annual column.
2 Air traffic only, non-stop from US port to foreign port. Does not imply total 'visitation' throughout the respective regions (refer U.S. Outbound Profile)
3 Percentage change is compared to the same time frame from the previous year.
Note:  Overseas and Mexican air data reported are from the Office of Travel and Tourism Industries (OTTI) "U.S. International Air Travel Statistics Report" I-92.
OTTI obtains the U.S. departures, via air, to Canada from Statistics Canada.
To learn more about the I-92 program, visit:
Source:  U.S. Department of Commerce, International Trade Administration, Office of Travel and Tourism Industries.
